Articles.Content:
causing science units to break when transmitting data kinda defeats the purpose of probes!

Even the the first space craft had flight computers and ground crew to help with orbit/rendezvous planning and execution.

otherwise, I like what I have seen so far.

I use the small science parts on my probes, the thermometer, barometer, accelerometer and gravioli detector. These ones are re-usable from what I've seen, which is good for doing transmissions from multiple situations.
